description: The latest trunk requires spawn to accept the variable image_meta as the 4th argument to the method call.  This needs to be added.
title: openvz driver spawn broken with trunk

comments.content: The latest trunk requires spawn to accept the variable image_meta as the 4th argument to the method call.  This needs to be added.
